query: SELECT CONCAT('FILE_ID=', f.id, ' URL=', f.url, ' FILEKEY=', COALESCE(f.fileKey, 'NULL'), ' THUMB=', COALESCE(f.thumbnailUrl, 'NULL'), ' SIZE=', f.fileSize) as info FROM files f WHERE f.mimeType LIKE 'video/%' ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT CONCAT('FILE_ID=', f.id, ' URL=', f.url, ' FILEKEY=', COALESCE(f.fileKey, 'NULL'), ' THUMB=', COALESCE(f.thumbnailUrl, 'NULL'), ' SIZE=', f.fileSize) as info FROM files f WHERE f.mimeType LIKE 'video/%' ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;
